titles.title: A bill for the relief of Esidronio Arreola-Saucedo, Maria Elna Cobain Arreola, Nayely Arreola Carlos, and Cindy Jael Arreola.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1130-1131)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 3/2/2011--Introduced. Provides for the relief of Esidronio Arreola-Saucedo, Maria Elna Cobain Arreola, Nayely Arreola Carlos, and Cindy Jael Arreola.
